definitions.definition: ships in general or considered as a group

examples.text: The canal is open to shipping.
Merchant shipping has become increasingly specialized.
No shipping entered the port that day.

definitions.definition: the activity of carrying people or goods from one place to another by ship or by some other means

examples.text: We offer free shipping on orders over $50.
She arranged for the shipping of her furniture to England.
She married a shipping magnate in 1997.
Their shipping line operates mainly from the Baltic ports.

definitions.definition: the act of thinking two people should be in a romantic relationship

examples.text: Shipping of the main characters is popular among fans of the show.
